name: PONG 2 (MhamedGD)
description:
If Atari didn't stop at Pong and Created Pong2, A game that combines Pong and Tennis at its own rules.

  1. A player scores if the ball touches the opposite court twice.
  2. A player scores if the ball touches the opposite outside court without the need to touch the court as opposed to normal Tennis.
  3. A player gets a point if the opposite party swings the ball at the net.

This Game has 1 Screen Multiplayer.

Music is done by Manuel Zito (Discord: Manuel Zito##6573) Sound Effects is done by ClairdeLou (Discord: ClairdeLou#3989)

Developed for the:

GoedWare Game Jam #7

The theme (Alternate Reality) as in the idea of the game itself (That atari created Pong2), (Time is power) is applied in the sense that the more you let the ball fly through your court the more power you accumulate to swing the ball backward.
